marklogic.body: Guyer is with out a doubt the strongest candidate for the 4th OF Spot---Although he notoriously starts slow, he has all of the tools to be an everyday player for the rays. As for his the field issues- he doesn't have an " the field" issue. He is wrapped up in Bush's mess who def has the field issues and who will most likely never see playing time again. Guyers mind is as far away from this accident as it can be, bad things happen to good people and i'm sure his name will fade away from this "Off the field issue" back to his performance on the field.. I look for solid numbers from him if he get the playing time and the chance to prove himself at the next level. Â
